## Introduction {background-image=background.png}

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column}

### Dataset
- Prostate dataset from this data base : https://hbiostat.org/data/
- The dataset focuses on patients with prostate cancer
- Prostate cancer is one of the most common cancer types among men
- Methods used to diagnose include Serum hemoglobin testing and prostatic acid phosphatase (PAP) testing
- Elevated PAP levels -> increased activity in prostate tissue which is often a precursor for prostate cancer or other prostate related diseases
